# <a name="insert-a-picture-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="0f87b-102">在 Outlook 网页网站中插入图片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f87b-102">Insert a picture in Outlook on the web</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f87b-103">如果要添加在电子邮件正文中显示的图像，可以添加嵌入式图像。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f87b-103">If you want to add an image that displays in the body of your email, you can add an inline image.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="0f87b-104">选择</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f87b-104">Select the</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="0f87b-105">在撰写窗格的底部**以内联方式插入图片**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f87b-105">**Insert pictures inline** at the bottom of the compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="0f87b-106">浏览到您的计算机上的图片位置，选择它，然后选择 "**打开**"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f87b-106">Browse to the location of the picture on your computer, select it, and then select **Open**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="0f87b-107">若要了解个性化设置邮件的其他方法，请参阅[在 web 上的 Outlook 中自定义电子](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41)邮件。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="0f87b-107">To learn about other ways to personalize your message, see [Customize your email message in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span></span>
